sentences.en: A new cast steel materials with spheroidal graphite has been studied.
sentences.cn: 文中研究的是球状石墨铸钢新材料.

sentences.en: A powerful electric current is passed through a piece of graphite.
sentences.cn: 给一块石墨通入强电流。

sentences.en: Commonly used bearing material has SiC ceramics, graphite, PTFE, such as filling.
sentences.cn: 常用的轴承材料有碳化硅陶瓷 、 石墨 、 填充聚四氟乙烯等.

sentences.en: Filler generally Baptist oil or graphite coated with asbestos rope.
sentences.cn: 填料一般用浸油或涂有石墨的石棉绳.

sentences.en: From the standpoint of know-how the only difference between the miner of graphite in Ceylon and the logger in Oregon is in the type of know-how.
sentences.cn: 从知道者的立场来看所谓的知道之间的不同不过是锡兰的矿工之于石墨和俄勒冈的伐木工人之间在某一类别的知道而已。

sentences.en: Further, graphite cores may be safer than non - graphite cores under some accident scenarios.
sentences.cn: 再者,根据一些事故解说, 石墨堆芯可比 非 石墨堆芯更安全一些.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its linear counterpart, poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble, infusible, and brittle.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性物 聚苯,过于不溶, 不溶和发脆.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its linear counterpart, poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物, 聚 ( 名聚-苯撑 ) 都是极难溶解的.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its liner counterpart , poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物聚苯,极不易溶解.

sentences.en: Graphite is chemically allied to diamond.
sentences.cn: 石墨和金刚石在化学组成上有联系.

sentences.en: In graphite sheets, carbon atoms bond together in rings.
sentences.cn: 石墨层中的碳原子相互连接形成碳环。

sentences.en: Made from cast iron, it is finished in graphite enamel.
sentences.cn: 它是用铸铁制成，最后在外面搪了一层石墨。

sentences.en: Not much meets the eye -- there's some wood, lacquer. the printed labeling, graphite lead, a bit of metal, and an eraser.
sentences.cn: 摄入眼帘的并不多——它包括一些木头、漆皮、银号的标记、石墨铅芯、一点金属片还有一只橡皮。

sentences.en: Our company mainly trades in graphite packing graphite ring.
sentences.cn: 我们公司主要经营石墨密封产品.

sentences.en: So inside the graphite, the pebbles are literally dropped in place and discharged through the bottom and then recycled.
sentences.cn: 所以，在石墨里面，卵石是,掉进去了，还通过这个底部排出去了,然后被回收了。

sentences.en: The allotropes of carbon include diamond, graphite and charcoal, all with the same chemical properties.
sentences.cn: 碳的同素异形体包括金刚石 、 石墨和木炭, 所有这些物质都具有相同的化学性质.

sentences.en: The graphite is mixed with clay from Mississippi in which ammonium hydroxide is used in the refining process.
sentences.cn: 石墨要与产自密西西比河床的粘土混合，在精炼过程中，还要用到氢氧化铵。

sentences.en: The nation boasts veins of coal, iron ore, limestone, magnesite, graphite, copper, zinc, lead and precious metals.
sentences.cn: 这个国家拥有煤炭、铁矿石、石灰石、菱镁矿、石墨、铜、锌、铅和贵金属等矿脉。

sentences.en: The pistons are graphite-coated to reduce friction.
sentences.cn: 活塞上涂了一层石墨以减小摩擦力。

sentences.en: Therefore, in the - high temperature graphite insulation performance is very reliable.
sentences.cn: 因此, 在超高温条件下石墨的隔热性能是很可靠的.

phrases.tran_cn: 石墨模子，石墨模具；石墨模

trans.tran_en: a soft black substance that is a kind of carbon , used in pencils, paints, and electrical equipment
